alert.note: Alert for Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 09 at 2:02AM MDT until May 09 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Niobrara County. In Nebraska, Dawes County, Box Butte County, Scotts Bluff County, Banner County, Morrill County, Northern Sioux County and Southern Sioux County. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 7 PM this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees, fencing, and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds. A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
